refnamediv.refpurpose: set dates origin or waits until date

listitem.para: a real number. The number of seconds associated to the realtime argument

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: These two functions can be used to handle real time into Scilab.
realtimeinit(time_unit) defines the time unit associated to the realtime argument t
first call to realtime(t0) sets current date to (t0). subsequent calls to realtime(t) wait till date t is reached.
